attributes.review: first off I got this app because i just love trump he’s my president ofc but then I gots to getting on his app and my phone EXPLODED apparently iPhones don’t like bs but it’s fine I used my unemployment check which I frauded to buy a new one😗✌️✨

attributes.review: Because of this app I got 39 dogs,12 rabbits, and 3 goose just so I could train them to only eat Cheetos so I could prepare them to eat the biggest Cheeto of all.I am still training them but I will say I am incredibly close to accomplishing my goal.

attributes.review: The worst most confusing app I have ever downloaded. My phone started bugging right after I opened the app, I think there may be a virus connected to the app. Absolutely do not recommend downloading or voting for this man.

attributes.review: i downloaded the app and as soon as it opened my popsicle floated out of my hand, broke in half, and said “Trump2020” I tried to grab it but it became a yellow rotten cheeto. After that, it possessed my hamster and it became 7ft y’all and showed me the picture of trumps shlong. I do not recommend

attributes.review: First off this app will steal all of your colored pencils! And crayons. I took my dog to get some new coloring material and as soon as we got home the app just snatched all of the supplies! I then got some treats to make my beloved dog forget about the whole ordeal, and get this, THIS APP TOOK THE TREATS TOO. HORRIBLE. I DO NOT RECOMMEND 🤢😱😡
